Details: Srijangram - Tinkonia part III | Erosion is going on along the right bank of river Manas -Beki in a length of 2 km approximately. Dated on 28.05.2022 | 0

Doomdooma - 1. Village : No. 3 Kordoiguri ( Goriyating ), 2. Village: No. 1 Kordoiguri(Darjijan), 3. Village : No. 2 Kordoiguri ( Simoluguri Satra ). | 1.
